member.name: DML_OUTPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC
member.summary: Describes a connection within a graph of DirectML operators defined by and passed to . This structure is used to define a connection from an output of an internal node to a graph output.

member.name: DML_OUTPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.GraphOutputIndex
member.summary: The index of the graph output to which a connection from an internal node output is specified.

member.name: DML_OUTPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.ToNodeIndex
member.summary: The index of the internal node from which the connection to the graph output is specified.

member.name: DML_OUTPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.ToNodeOutputIndex
member.summary: The index of the output of the internal node where the connection is specified.

member.name: DML_OUTPUT_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.Name
member.summary: An optional name for the graph connection. If provided, this might be used within certain error messages emitted by the DirectML debug layer.
